nodes.text: Ha, big guy! Looks like you can't get me from up here.
Wait, is that a good idea?

options.text: Show the Sea Serpent what you're made of!

nodes.text: All right, the bigger they are, the better I need to be!

If a Sea Serpent you happen to see,
The smart thing to do is to flee,
For when you attack,
You'll wind up as a snack,
Or maybe the main course entrée.
That's what I thought.
Let's see, what could I possibly feed him?
I don't think I have anything he could possibly want.

options.text: Feed Dead Drat to the Serpent

nodes.text: He doesn't look impressed. Guess Drat isn't on his menu.

options.text: Feed Dried Fish to the Serpent

nodes.text: How would you like some yummy dried fish?
It's just fish. I think you'll like it.
... Sniff ... Sniff ...

options.text: Feed Proach Parts to the Serpent

nodes.text: I think he just turned his nose up at eating proach. I don't really blame him.
Would the nice Sea Serpent like another stinky old dried fish to eat?
(eager nod)
Here you go, boy... or girl. A nice fishy snack for you.
... whimper ...
Poor guy still looks hungry.
Was that enough fish for you now?
Have a nice nap!
Sorry, I don't have any fish for you now.
... whimper ...
